name: CS3113 Marble Maize Game
description:
Super Monkey Ball-inspired marble-based platformer where you play as a hamster in a ball collecting corn (maize!). I put way too much time into this so enjoy it.

PATCH 1.1 (2023-02-16):
-Added quick level select. Use 1, 2, or 3 on your keyboard to instantly load the corresponding level. Only available on web version.
